name: Alan Mosca
bio: Alan is a software engineer at Wallaroo Labs. He enjoys discovering the boundaries of distributed systems and the theory behind the algorithms we use. Prior to joining Wallaroo Labs, Alan spent his time divided between working in quantitative finance and his research in Deep Learning at Birkbeck, University of London. He spends most of his free time working on his research, or mountain biking in the south-east of England.
